shouldKnow.coverDescription: Having a pool cover/shelter allows to reduce the power consumption of a heating solution up to XX%. By choosing a cover, it also prevents 90% of water loss due to water evaporation.

remember.coverDescription: Not having  a cover / shelter increases the power consumption of a heating solution
